channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 路透调查：新兴市场货币短期内将稳步上涨
item.description: Most emerging market currencies will struggle to recoup this year's losses against the dollar in coming months as expectations for aggressive rate cuts from the U.S. Federal Reserve diminish, a Reuters poll of FX strategists found.翻译:路透对外汇策略师的一项调查发现，随着美联储大幅降息的预期减弱，大多数新兴市场货币兑美元汇率在未来几个月将难以收复今年的损失。
item.author: Devayani Sathyan, Vuyani Ndaba

item.title: 到2030年印度将成为全球最大石油需求增长动力-IEA
item.description: India is expected to be the largest driver of global oil demand growth between 2023 and 2030, narrowly taking the lead from top importer China, the International Energy Agency (IEA) said on Wednesday.翻译:国际能源署(IEA)周三表示，预计印度将成为2023年至2030年全球石油需求增长的最大推动力，以微弱优势领先于最大进口国中国。
item.author: Sethuraman R, Nidhi Verma

item.title: 珠宝商潘多拉 (Pandora) 今年迄今销售额“健康”
item.description: Pandora , the world's biggest jewellery maker, said on Wednesday its performance since the start of the year has been "healthy" with high single-digit sales growth, as it announced a share buyback programme after a strong run.翻译:全球最大的珠宝制造商潘多拉 (Pandora) 周三表示，自今年年初以来，其业绩“健康”，销售额实现高个位数增长，并在强劲表现后宣布了股票回购计划。
item.author: Helen Reid

item.title: 菲律宾将加强在台湾面临的岛屿上的军事存在
item.description: The Philippines' defence chief has ordered the military to boost the number of troops stationed at the northernmost islands near Taiwan to fortify Manila's territorial defence capabilities.翻译:菲律宾国防部长已命令军方增加驻扎在台湾附近最北端岛屿的部队数量，以加强马尼拉的领土防御能力。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国在澳大利亚和新西兰以南设立南极站
item.description: China on Wednesday inaugurated its Ross Sea scientific research station, the official Xinhua news agency reported, starting operations in an outpost in a part of the Antarctic due south of Australia and New Zealand for the first time.翻译:据官方新华社报道，中国周三启用了罗斯海科学研究站，这是首次在澳大利亚和新西兰以南的南极部分地区的一个前哨站开始运营。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国视频应用抖音集团首席执行官辞职，在字节跳动担任新职务
item.description: TikTok owner ByteDance said on Wednesday that Zhang Nan has resigned as the CEO of Douyin Group, the popular short video platform's sister app in China, while assuming a new role to shepherd ByteDance's video editing app.翻译:TikTok 所有者字节跳动周三表示，张楠已辞去抖音集团首席执行官（该流行短视频平台在中国的姊妹应用程序）的首席执行官职务，同时担任新职务，负责管理字节跳动的视频编辑应用程序。
item.author: Josh Ye

item.title: 巴布亚新几内亚在领导人马拉佩抵达访问时向澳大利亚保证安全关系
item.description: Papua New Guinea Prime Minister James Marape arrived in Canberra on Wednesday, where he will address the national parliament a day later, on a visit that seeks to assure Australia of close security and historical ties even as PNG boosts trade with China.翻译:巴布亚新几内亚总理詹姆斯·马拉佩周三抵达堪培拉，一天后他将在那里向国民议会发表讲话，此次访问旨在确保澳大利亚在巴布亚新几内亚加强与中国的贸易的同时保持密切的安全和历史联系。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘竞价：等待北京市场的实际行动
item.description: A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.翻译:韦恩·科尔 (Wayne Cole) 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 软银有望录得一年多以来首个季度盈利
item.description: Japan's SoftBank Group is expected to post a net profit for the first time in five quarters when the tech investment giant reports earnings on Thursday, benefiting from strong gains in the value of its listed assets.翻译:日本软银集团预计将在周四公布财报时实现五个季度以来的首次净利润，受益于其上市资产价值的强劲增长。
item.author: Anton Bridge

item.title: 春节肉类销售放缓，北京屠夫情绪低落
item.description: The butchers in the Xinfadi wholesale food market, Beijing's largest, slouch on stools behind counters stacked with meat, occasionally looking up from their smartphone videos to call out to the few shoppers idly passing under the market's Lunar New Year decorations.翻译:北京最大的食品批发市场新发地的屠夫们无精打采地坐在堆满肉的柜台后面的凳子上，时不时地从智能手机视频中抬起头来招呼几位闲逛在市场农历新年装饰品下的购物者。
item.author: Mei Mei Chu

item.title: 中国恒大：负债开发商整顿背后的人
item.description: Restructuring experts from Alvarez & Marsal will rely on China connections and a track record of complicated corporate overhauls as they try to engineer an outcome for property giant Evergrande that will involve creditors, authorities and home buyers.翻译:Alvarez & Marsal 的重组专家将依靠与中国的联系以及复杂的企业重组的记录，试图为房地产巨头恒大设计一个涉及债权人、当局和购房者的结果。
item.author: Scott Murdoch, Yu Xie, Clare Jim

item.title: 中国将帮助新能源汽车行业应对外贸限制
item.description: China's commerce ministry said on Wednesday it would encourage the new energy vehicle industry to "actively" respond to foreign trade restrictions and cooperate with overseas firms, amid a European probe into Chinese subsidies for the sector.翻译:中国商务部周三表示，在欧洲对中国对该行业的补贴进行调查之际，中国商务部将鼓励新能源汽车行业“积极”应对外贸限制并与海外企业合作。
item.author: Sarah Wu, Albee Zhang

item.title: 亚洲股市小幅上涨，北京方面给市场留下悬念
item.description: Asian stocks firmed on Wednesday as investors waited to see if Beijing's increasingly frantic efforts to prop up its sagging share markets would actually work, while bonds enjoyed a reprieve from recent selling.翻译:亚洲股市周三走强，投资者在观望北京为支撑低迷股市而采取的日益疯狂的举措是否真正有效，而债券则因近期抛售而有所缓解。
item.author: Wayne Cole

item.title: 美元从近三个月高点回调后处于守势
item.description: The dollar remained under pressure on Wednesday after retreating from a nearly three-month high against the euro in the previous session, with a decline in U.S. bond yields adding to the drag.翻译:美元兑欧元在前一交易日从近三个月高点回落后，周三仍承压，其中美债收益率下降加剧了拖累。
item.author: Kevin Buckland

item.title: 北京呼吁韩国奉行“积极、客观、友好”的对华政策
item.description: China hopes South Korea will pursue a "positive, objective and friendly" policy towards Beijing, foreign minister Wang Yi said in a phone call with his South Korean counterpart on Tuesday.翻译:外交部长王毅周二在与韩国外长通电话时表示，中国希望韩国奉行“积极、客观、友好”的对华政策。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国间谍去年入侵了荷兰国防网络——情报机构
item.description: Chinese state-backed cyber spies gained access to a Dutch military network last year, Dutch intelligence agencies said on Tuesday, calling it part of a trend of Chinese political espionage against the Netherlands and its allies.翻译:荷兰情报机构周二表示，中国国家支持的网络间谍去年进入了荷兰军事网络，称这是中国针对荷兰及其盟国进行政治间谍活动的一部分。
item.author: James Pearson, Anthony Deutsch

item.title: 中国在北京会谈中向美国表达了对关税和制裁的担忧
item.description: China's financial officials expressed concerns to visiting U.S. Treasury officials about U.S. tariffs, investment restrictions and sanctions set up to "suppress" Chinese companies, the Chinese finance ministry said on Tuesday.翻译:中国财政部周二表示，中国金融官员向来访的美国财政部官员表达了对美国为“打压”中国企业而实施的关税、投资限制和制裁的担忧。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 由于太阳能行业陷入危机，欧洲因中国进口陷入困境
item.description: Europe's green energy transition is stuck between a rock and a hard place. A flood of cheap Chinese solar panel imports is driving record solar energy installations. But those same imports are crushing Europe's few local solar manufacturers.翻译:欧洲的绿色能源转型陷入进退两难的境地。大量廉价的中国太阳能电池板进口正在推动太阳能安装量创历史新高。但同样的进口正在压垮欧洲为数不多的本地太阳能制造商。
item.author: Kate Abnett, Nina Chestney

item.title: 中国海警船进入东海争议海域
item.description: China's Coast Guard said it patrolled the waters of the Diaoyu Islands on Tuesday - territories in the East China Sea that are claimed by China, Japan and Taiwan.翻译:中国海警表示，周二在钓鱼岛海域进行了巡逻。钓鱼岛是中国、日本和台湾都声称拥有主权的东海领土。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国采取措施支撑股市
item.description: Chinese shares rose on Wednesday, adding to their largest single-day gains in two years a day earlier, as authorities ramped up efforts to restore confidence and stabilise the battered markets.翻译:随着当局加大力度恢复信心并稳定遭受重创的市场，中国股市周三上涨，创下两年来最大单日涨幅。
item.author: Reuters
